attributes.action: ban commercial transit vans from parking over night outside other peoples houses!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ban commercial transit vans and other huge vehicles from parking over night outside other peoples houses!

Anyone who has had these huge ugly things blocking their outside window view will sympathise.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
